name: Humagotchya
description:
*** Controls WASD and Ctrl for Running ***

Humagotchya by Main Brain Nicholls. 

This is a fun little game about a human stuck in the world of tamagotchis. 

You have four daily tasks to complete. Eat, drink, wash, and going jogging.

Try moving about during your sleep... it's hilarious xD

Humagotchya is my entry for the weekly game jam 119.

Have fun :) !

Frank3TheTank
